author: Ronan McGreevy, Brian Hutton
title: Coronavirus: HSE warns restrictions may be extended as €72m nursing home fund unveiled
description: Nursing homes to get financial support, staff screening and priority tests in bid to curb spread
content:
A 72 million package of measures to help nursing homes tackle coronavirus outbreaks, has been announced by Minister for Health Simon Harris. 
The announcement came as it was confirmed on Saturday that some of the restrictions on work, travel and education, c… [+4502 chars]
